file_content.text: You. You're not the initiate.
You... are Sith! You honor us with your presence, mighty lord. Welcome to our prison.
But you're strong to have killed so many. You honor us. Welcome to our prison.
What is this? Are you the one behind the killings?
Who are you?
What sort of freak of a slave are you?
You're creepy.
Start talking--but move wrong and I kill you.
Talk or you're dead.
You want explanations?
I am Traga un-Vhol, leader of the Unchained. I am master of my hatred.
When the other slaves broke free, I laughed. Like you, I knew their "escape" was a delusion--for only Sith possess true freedom!
You know nothing about the Sith.
Fool.
I was a slave myself, before I became Sith.
I know slavery.
Yes. Yes, mighty one! Then you do understand!
No one is free in the Empire. Not even Sith.
True freedom is a lie.
Freedom's what you make of it.
Depends on how you see it.
Oh?
I know the Sith Code. Freedom comes through power--through victory!
Either way, you're still stuck here.
Didn't help you.
To leave would have been to die in the fire of Imperial blasters. I had other plans.
I saw a chance to prove myself. I culled weak from strong. I began to kill, and to teach.
I showed slaves freedom through bloodshed. Now my followers and I are the masters here--and soon, we will become Sith ourselves.
Murdering your fellow slaves doesn't make you Sith.
That's not how it works.
You may have potential--but are you strong in the Force?
Are you Force sensitive?
My strength is in my fists. But the Force has guided me here--and it has guided you.
Keep going.
We are hateful. We are powerful. We are free. In this way, we are already Sith.
That's crazy.
Look how these pathetic "free" men tremble at the sight of me.
Now, glorious lord, you can spread word of us to the Empire. Give us your blessing, and we shall serve.
Now you can spread word of us to the Empire. Your strength is great--with your approval, we shall serve.
Carry our message of allegiance to your masters, and we will become the new face of the Empire! We will be champions of the dark side!
The Empire will hear your message.
I'll help you.
As it should be. Take this datapad--my plea to the Sith Lords!
For now, I am not ready to leave the colossus. With every kill, I feel my power grow--and there are many slaves who may yet join me.
But soon, we will all be ready. We will await word from the Empire.
For now, continue your work. Kill the slaves in my name.
As you were.
You may do as you wish--but you don't yet understand the Sith.
You have a lot to learn.
Yes. I look forward to learning.
All right. In the meantime, use discretion. You don't need to draw more attention to yourself.
Lay low until called.
Working with the Empire isn't as fun as it sounds.
The Empire's not so great.
No. I know there will be glory. I know there will be power.
Good luck.
I'm sure you will. Doesn't make you any less of a madman.
You're still crazy.
You underestimate us. If we meet again, perhaps you will see this.
Farewell for now. We return to the shadows.
You're nothing but a murderer. What you're doing is disgusting.
You're sick and wrong.
My lord, how can you say this? All we've done--the blood we've spilled--it has all been for you.
Tell us, then--how else may we achieve true strength and respect of the Sith?
How can you say this? All we've done--the blood we've spilled--has been to earn the respect of the Empire.
You serve the Empire and the Sith. You murder the rebel slaves with ease. Tell us--how else may we achieve true strength?
You've made too many mistakes already. Surrender to the Empire, and you might redeem yourselves.
Surrender yourselves.
I'm not the one to teach you--but learn the Sith ways before fighting.
Learn, don't kill.
It's too late for that. Crawl into a hole somewhere and give up.
You can't.
But we--we believed. I believed.
I will... I will spread your message to the others. We will do as you say.
